tool_description: Live is the new Pay As You Go real-time Lookup service from TMT Analysis. We are a leading provider of mobile numbering information and data globally. The service is available either via an online look up or via our API.
title: TMT Live

api_list.name: GET
api_list.description: Detailed global phone number and subscriber data intelligence to strengthen authentications, evaluate fraud risks, and enhance the user experience.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tmt-live.p.rapidapi.com/{number}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tmt-live.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
